dataTemplate.name: XXUPHR_HC_CORE_NONCORE_INDI
dataTemplate.description: UP HR Headcount - Core and Non Core Personnel Individual

dataQuery.sqlStatement:
SELECT admin.cu ,nvl(fac, 0) fac ,nvl(admin, 0) admin ,nvl(reps, 0) reps ,nvl(rfe, 0) rfe ,nvl(fac,0) + nvl(admin,0) + nvl(reps,0) + nvl(rfe,0) tcu FROM ( SELECT hsck.concatenated_segments cu ,COUNT(1) fac FROM hr.per_all_people_f papf ,hr.per_all_assignments_f paaf ,hr.pay_people_groups ppg ,hr.hr_soft_coding_keyflex hsck WHERE papf.person_id = paaf.person_id AND :P_EFF_DATE BETWEEN paaf.effective_start_date AND paaf.effective_end_date AND :P_EFF_DATE BETWEEN papf.effective_start_date AND papf.effective_end_date AND paaf.primary_flag = 'Y' AND papf.person_type_id = 1126 AND paaf.soft_coding_keyflex_id = hsck.soft_coding_keyflex_id AND ppg.people_group_id = paaf.people_group_id AND ppg.group_name IN ('Academic.Faculty' ) AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Lecturer%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Fellow%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Visiting%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Adjunct%') AND paaf.EMPLOYMENT_CATEGORY IN (SELECT FLV.LOOKUP_CODE FROM FND_LOOKUP_VALUES FLV WHERE LOOKUP_TYPE = 'EMP_CAT' AND ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' AND FLV.MEANING IN ( 'FT Permanent' , 'PT Permanent' ,'FT Temporary' ,'PT Temporary' , 'FT Substitute' ,'PT Substitute' ,'FT Casual' ,'PT Casual'
,'FT Contractual' ,'PT Contractual' )) GROUP BY hsck.concatenated_segments ORDER BY hsck.concatenated_segments ) fac ,(SELECT hsck.concatenated_segments cu ,COUNT(1) admin FROM hr.per_all_people_f papf ,hr.per_all_assignments_f paaf ,hr.pay_people_groups ppg ,hr.hr_soft_coding_keyflex hsck WHERE papf.person_id = paaf.person_id AND :P_EFF_DATE BETWEEN paaf.effective_start_date AND paaf.effective_end_date AND :P_EFF_DATE BETWEEN papf.effective_start_date AND papf.effective_end_date AND paaf.primary_flag = 'Y' AND papf.person_type_id = 1126 AND paaf.soft_coding_keyflex_id = hsck.soft_coding_keyflex_id AND ppg.people_group_id = paaf.people_group_id AND ppg.group_name IN ('Non-Academic.' ,'Non-Academic.PGH Fiscal' ,'Non-Academic.PGH Health Operations' ,'Non-Academic.PGH Nursing' ,'Non-Academic.PGH Administrative' ) AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Lecturer%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Fellow%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Visiting%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Adjunct%') AND paaf.EMPLOYMENT_CATEGORY IN (SELECT FLV.LOOKUP_CODE FROM FND_LOOKUP_VALUES FLV WHERE LOOKUP_TYPE = 'EMP_CAT' AND ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' AND FLV.MEANING IN ( 'FT Permanent' , 'PT Permanent' ,'FT Temporary' ,'PT Temporary' , 'FT Substitute' ,'PT Substitute' ,'FT Casual' ,'PT Casual' ,'FT Contractual' ,'PT Contractual' )) GROUP BY hsck.concatenated_segments ORDER BY hsck.concatenated_segments ) admin ,(SELECT hsck.concatenated_segments cu ,COUNT(1) reps FROM hr.per_all_people_f papf ,hr.per_all_assignments_f paaf ,hr.pay_people_groups ppg ,hr.hr_soft_coding_keyflex hsck WHERE papf.person_id = paaf.person_id AND :P_EFF_DATE BETWEEN paaf.effective_start_date AND paaf.effective_end_date AND :P_EFF_DATE BETWEEN papf.effective_start_date AND papf.effective_end_date AND paaf.primary_flag = 'Y' AND papf.person_type_id = 1126 AND paaf.soft_coding_keyflex_id = hsck.soft_coding_keyflex_id AND ppg.people_group_id = paaf.people_group_id AND ppg.group_name IN ('Academic.REPS (Research/Extension/ Professionals)' ) AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Lecturer%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Fellow%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Visiting%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Adjunct%') AND paaf.EMPLOYMENT_CATEGORY IN (SELECT FLV.LOOKUP_CODE FROM FND_LOOKUP_VALUES FLV WHERE LOOKUP_TYPE = 'EMP_CAT' AND ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' AND FLV.MEANING IN ( 'FT Permanent' , 'PT Permanent' ,'FT Temporary' ,'PT Temporary' , 'FT Substitute' ,'PT Substitute' ,'FT Casual' ,'PT Casual' ,'FT Contractual' ,'PT Contractual' )) GROUP BY hsck.concatenated_segments ORDER BY hsck.concatenated_segments ) reps ,(SELECT hsck.concatenated_segments cu ,COUNT(1) rfe FROM hr.per_all_people_f papf ,hr.per_all_assignments_f paaf ,hr.pay_people_groups ppg ,hr.hr_soft_coding_keyflex hsck WHERE papf.person_id = paaf.person_id AND :P_EFF_DATE BETWEEN paaf.effective_start_date AND paaf.effective_end_date AND :P_EFF_DATE BETWEEN papf.effective_start_date AND papf.effective_end_date AND paaf.primary_flag = 'Y' AND papf.person_type_id = 1126 AND paaf.soft_coding_keyflex_id = hsck.soft_coding_keyflex_id AND ppg.people_group_id = paaf.people_group_id AND ppg.group_name IN ('Academic.Research Faculty/Extension Faculty' ) AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Lecturer%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Fellow%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Visiting%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Adjunct%') AND paaf.EMPLOYMENT_CATEGORY IN (SELECT FLV.LOOKUP_CODE FROM FND_LOOKUP_VALUES FLV WHERE LOOKUP_TYPE = 'EMP_CAT' AND ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' AND FLV.MEANING IN ( 'FT Permanent' , 'PT Permanent' ,'FT Temporary' ,'PT Temporary' , 'FT Substitute' ,'PT Substitute' ,'FT Casual' ,'PT Casual' ,'FT Contractual' ,'PT Contractual' )) GROUP BY hsck.concatenated_segments ORDER BY CASE WHEN hsck.concatenated_segments = 'UP System' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ) rfe WHERE admin.cu = fac.cu (+) AND admin.cu = reps.cu (+) AND admin.cu = rfe.cu (+) AND admin.cu NOT IN ('UPV Tacloban College DO NOT USE')

SELECT perm.cu ,NVL(perm, 0) perm ,NVL(temp, 0) temp ,NVL(subs, 0) subs ,NVL(casl, 0) casl ,NVL(cont, 0) cont ,nvl(perm,0) + nvl(temp,0) + nvl(subs,0) + nvl(casl,0) + nvl(cont,0) tcu FROM (SELECT '%Lecturer%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Fellow%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Visiting%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Adjunct%') AND paaf.EMPLOYMENT_CATEGORY IN (SELECT FLV.LOOKUP_CODE hr.per_all_people_f papf ,hr.per_all_assignments_f paaf ,hr.pay_people_groups ppg ,hr.hr_soft_coding_keyflex hsck WHERE papf.person_id = paaf.person_id AND :P_EFF_DATE BETWEEN paaf.effective_start_date AND paaf.effective_end_date AND :P_EFF_DATE BETWEEN papf.effective_start_date AND papf.effective_end_date AND paaf.primary_flag = 'Y' AND papf.person_type_id = 1126 AND ,'PT Substitute' 'FT Casual' ,'PT Casual' -- ,'FT Contractual' -- ,'PT Contractual' )) GROUP BY hsck.concatenated_segments ) casl ,(SELECT hsck.concatenated_segments cu ,COUNT(1) cont FROM hr.per_all_people_f papf ,hr.per_all_assignments_f paaf ,hr.pay_people_groups ppg ,hr.hr_soft_coding_keyflex hsck WHERE papf.person_id = paaf.person_id AND :P_EFF_DATE BETWEEN WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Visiting%') AND paaf.position_id NOT IN (SELECT position_id FROM per_all_positions pap WHERE pap.name LIKE '%Adjunct%') AND paaf.EMPLOYMENT_CATEGORY IN (SELECT FLV.LOOKUP_CODE
